title: Authentication System
description: Secure & Seamless Authentication: A MERN-Based User Login System with JWT & Bcrypt Encryption

title: Restful API
description: Built a scalable RESTful API using Node.js and Express, tested and optimized with Postman for reliability and performance.

title: Myntra Clone
description: Built a responsive Myntra clone using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, replicating the UI and enhancing user experience

title: Image Search Engine
description: Built an Image Search Engine using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, integrating the Unsplash API for seamless image retrieval.

title: Mentorship Platform (SLIET)
description: Developed a responsive mentorship platform for SLIET using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling students to book one-on-one sessions with faculty mentors.

title: Sign Language Recognition System
description: Used CNN with TensorFlow/Keras to classify hand gestures from images. Utilized OpenCV for real-time webcam input, and performed preprocessing and visualization using NumPy, Matplotlib, and Pandas.
